comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:8.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/8.0
Build ID: 20111104165243

Steps to reproduce:

Altered the command line arguments for a specific filetype/protocol (http protocol in my case) 
[HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\http\shell\open\command]
from:
-requestPending -osint -url "%1" 
to
-requestPending -osint -url "%1" -p dev -no-remote

where "dev" is a profile that is not the default one

Info:
Firefox 8.0 no addons
Windows 7 x64 ultimate
Replicated also in 5,6,7 and in other systems (win 7 x32 ult, server 2008 r2, and more)


Actual results:

Firefox started using the default profile


Expected results:

Start using the requested profile
